289: On this day in sports history March 1, Lenny Wilkens became the 1st coach in NBA history to reach 1,000 career wins, as the Atlanta Hawks defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers in 1996.
290: On this day in sports history March 1, Atlanta Hawks Small Forward Dominique Wilkins scored 50 Points against the Detroit Pistons in 1988.
291: On this day in sports history March 1, John Drew of the Atlanta Hawks set an NBA record for most turnovers committed in a single game with 14 against the New Jersey Nets in 1978.
